derivation: probably akin to G5316 (φωνή) through the idea of disclosure;
strongs_def: a tone (articulate, bestial or artificial); by implication, an address (for any purpose), saying or language
outline:
1. a sound, a tone
    1. of inanimate things, as musical instruments
  2. a voice
    1. of the sound of uttered words
  3. speech
    1. of a language, tongue
